ygData.subject: Re: Loosing exp when dying
ygData.msgSnippet: RE: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dyingyou stop getting the starting stuff at level 4 I thought ... From: Whitmore, Lance To: EverQuest@onelist.com Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
RE: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dyingyou stop getting the starting stuff at level 4 I thought

----- Original Message -----
From: Whitmore, Lance
To: 'EverQuest@onelist.com'
Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 9:52 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dying


Shane its lvl 5 when you do.. its the same lvl when you no longer get food and basic weapon when you die.. the thing is once your reach five no matter how many times you die you can lose experience to the point that knocks you back to 4.

:)
-----Original Message-----
From: Shane Bole [mailto:shane0009@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 8:48 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dying


you start losing exp at level 6
the amount you lose increases each level
----- Original Message -----
From: Whitmore, Lance
To: 'EverQuest@onelist.com'
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 10:19 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dying


This is just a guess but i think its your level that is used to calculate. It seems that the higher you are the more experience you lose. You dont lose any until you reach lvl 5, after that it seems to increase with each lvl.

Lance

-----Original Message-----
From: scott@... [mailto:scott@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 10:13 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dying



From: scott@...

I saw someone write somewhere that the exp you loose depends on the monster that kills you. Such as if you die from a monster that is many levels below you, you loose more exp. Is this true?

Azboklin the enchanter
